statements: SELECT * FROM BacteriaGeneticSequences ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT strain_name, collection_date FROM BacteriaGeneticSequences WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT genetic_sequence, strain_name FROM BacteriaGeneticSequences WHERE collection_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM BacteriaGeneticSequences WHERE id = 3;
SELECT researcher_name, COUNT(*) as num_sequences FROM BacteriaGeneticSequences GROUP BY researcher_name ORDER BY num_sequences DESC;
SELECT * FROM BacteriaGeneticSequences WHERE id = 1;
SELECT strain_name, genetic_sequence FROM BacteriaGeneticSequences WHERE researcher_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT id, strain_name, collection_date FROM BacteriaGeneticSequences ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM BacteriaGeneticSequences WHERE collection_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_sequences, researcher_name FROM BacteriaGeneticSequences GROUP BY researcher_name ORDER BY total_sequences DESC;
SELECT * FROM BacteriaStrains;
SELECT StrainName, GenomicSequence FROM BacteriaStrains;
SELECT StrainID, StrainName, GenomicSequence FROM BacteriaStrains WHERE StrainID = 1;
SELECT ResearcherName, DateCataloged FROM ResearcherCatalog;
SELECT ResearcherName, StrainName FROM ResearcherCatalog JOIN BacteriaStrains ON ResearcherCatalog.StrainID = BacteriaStrains.StrainID;
SELECT StrainName, GenomicSequence FROM BacteriaStrains WHERE StrainID = 1;
SELECT ResearcherName, DateCataloged FROM ResearcherCatalog ORDER BY ResearcherName ASC;
SELECT * FROM BacteriaStrains WHERE GenomicSequence LIKE '%AGCT%';
SELECT ResearcherName, StrainName FROM ResearcherCatalog JOIN BacteriaStrains ON ResearcherCatalog.StrainID = BacteriaStrains.StrainID;
SELECT DISTINCT StrainID, StrainName FROM BacteriaStrains ORDER BY StrainID DESC;
SELECT * FROM bacteria_strains;
SELECT id, strain_name FROM bacteria_strains;
SELECT * FROM researcher WHERE institution='University';
SELECT id, name, institution FROM researcher ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT strain_name, genetic_sequence FROM bacteria_strains WHERE id=1;
SELECT * FROM bacteria_strains
SELECT name, institution FROM researcher WHERE id = 1
SELECT strain_name, genetic_sequence FROM bacteria_strains ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM comparison_results WHERE similarity_score > 0.7
SELECT name, similarity_score FROM researcher INNER JOIN comparison_results ON researcher.id = comparison_results.researcher_id
SELECT * FROM BacteriaStrains;
SELECT bacteria_id, bacteria_name FROM BacteriaStrains WHERE bacteria_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Experiments WHERE experiment_date = '2023-05-15';
SELECT researcher_name, bacteria_name FROM Researchers r, BacteriaStrains b WHERE r.researcher_id = 1 AND b.bacteria_id = 2;
SELECT sequence_data FROM Sequences WHERE bacteria_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM BacteriaStrains WHERE bacteria_id = 1;
SELECT bacteria_name, sequence FROM BacteriaStrains WHERE bacteria_name LIKE 'Streptococcus%';
SELECT researcher_name, experiment_date, result FROM Researchers JOIN Experiments ON Researchers.researcher_id = Experiments.researcher_id;
SELECT * FROM Experiments WHERE experiment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT BacteriaStrains.bacteria_name, Sequences.sequence_data FROM BacteriaStrains JOIN Sequences ON BacteriaStrains.bacteria_id = Sequences.bacteria_id;
SELECT * FROM bacteria;
SELECT id, name, sequence FROM bacteria ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE institution='University X';
SELECT id, name, email FROM researchers WHERE name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT r.name AS researcher_name, b.name AS bacteria_name, e.start_date, e.end_date FROM researchers r JOIN experiments e ON r.id = e.researcher_id JOIN bacteria b ON b.id = e.bacteria_id;
SELECT * FROM bacteria;
SELECT name, sequence FROM bacteria WHERE strain = 'E. coli';
SELECT id, name, institution FROM researchers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT b.name AS bacteria_name, r.name AS researcher_name, e.start_date, e.end_date FROM experiments e JOIN bacteria b ON b.id = e.bacteria_id JOIN researchers r ON r.id = e.researcher_id;

SELECT c.id AS comparison_id, r.result_text AS result_1_text, r2.result_text AS result_2_text, c.similarity_score FROM comparisons c JOIN results r ON r.id = c.result_id_1 JOIN results r2 ON r2.id = c.result_id_2 WHERE c.similarity_score > 0.8;
